dt: {bc}a Northerner in the South after the American Civil War usually seeking private gain under the Reconstruction governments
{bc}a nonresident or new resident who seeks private gain from an area often by meddling in its business or politics

et: from their carrying all their belongings in carpetbags
shortdef: a Northerner in the South after the American Civil War usually seeking private gain under the Reconstruction governments
outsider; especially : a nonresident or new resident who seeks private gain from an area often by meddling in its business or politics
